products.name: Silver Hammer Shiraz 2022
products.description: A rich McLaren Vale Shiraz with deep blackberry flavours, smooth tannins and a touch of spice.

products.name: Ellen Street Shiraz 2022
products.description: Classic Shiraz from old vines along Ellen Street — full-bodied with rich fruit and long finish.

products.name: Nero d’Avola 2023
products.description: Vibrant Sicilian-style red wine grown in McLaren Vale. Juicy cherry and savoury notes.

products.name: Grenache Rosé 2024
products.description: Dry rosé made from Grenache grapes. Crisp, floral and refreshing with notes of strawberry.

products.name: Adelaide Hills Chardonnay 2024
products.description: Elegant Chardonnay with stone fruit, citrus and creamy oak texture from the cool Adelaide Hills.

products.name: Four Roads Grenache 2023
products.description: Grenache from four vineyard sites, beautifully aromatic with layers of cherry and spice.

products.name: Liqueur Mead 375ml
products.description: A rich fortified mead with intense honey aroma, smooth palate and sweet finish.

products.name: Honey Mead 750ml
products.description: Traditional honey wine with floral aromas and a natural sweetness — one of Maxwell’s classics.

products.name: Minotaur Reserve Shiraz 2023
products.description: Flagship wine of Maxwell. Powerful, structured Shiraz with immense concentration and depth.

products.name: Late Bottle Vintage Port
products.description: A rich, sweet and smooth fortified wine aged in barrel for extended complexity.

products.name: Fiano 2025
products.description: Crisp and aromatic Fiano with notes of pear, citrus, and almond, showing Italian varietal elegance.

products.name: Verdelho 2024
products.description: Vibrant tropical fruit flavours with fresh acidity, ideal chilled for warm days.

products.name: Clan Exclusive Malbec 2024
products.description: Limited edition Malbec — dark, inky, and plush with ripe plum and mocha notes.

products.name: Cabernet Franc 2024
products.description: Medium-bodied Cabernet Franc with bright red fruit and herbal spice complexity.

products.name: GSM 2023
products.description: Blend of Grenache, Shiraz and Mourvèdre — smooth and fruit-driven with great balance.

products.name: Tiers of Wisdom Grenache 2024
products.description: Elegant Grenache showing layers of red berries, spice, and silky tannins.

products.name: Eocene 'Ancient Earth' Shiraz 2023
products.description: Premium Shiraz grown on ancient limestone soils — concentrated, earthy, and long-lasting.

products.name: Lime Cave Cabernet Sauvignon 2022
products.description: Cabernet Sauvignon aged in Maxwell’s unique limestone cave — bold and expressive.

products.name: Spiced Mead 750ml
products.description: Aromatic honey wine infused with spices — smooth, warming and delicious.

products.name: Sparkling Mead 4 pack x 330ml
products.description: Refreshing carbonated mead with gentle bubbles and honey flavour, perfect chilled.

products.name: Grenache Blanc 2025
products.description: Rare white Grenache with delicate floral notes, fresh acidity and clean finish.

products.name: Fortified White
products.description: Rich fortified white wine with toffee, honey and almond flavours.

products.name: Little Demon Envious Sparkling NV
products.description: Vibrant sparkling blend with refreshing citrus and crisp acidity.

products.name: Old + Rare Tawny
products.description: Exceptional tawny port-style wine aged for depth, smoothness and nutty sweetness.

products.name: Sparkling Mead 24 pack x 330ml
products.description: Bulk pack of sparkling mead — honey flavour, lightly carbonated and crisp.
